# Assemblage

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Assemblage is to optimize the weights of subcomponents to maximize the predictive capability of an aggregate.

## Installation

You can install the development version of Assemblage from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ChristopheBarrette/Assemblage")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(Assemblage)
## basic example code
```
